summary: HEADLIGHT BEAM SHAKES CONSTANTLY WHILE DRIVING AT NIGHT. DEALER ADDRESSED ISSUE SEVERAL TIMES WITH NOTHING BEING ACCOMPLISHED AS THE LIGHTS HAVE CONTINUED TO SHAKE. HEADLIGHT BEAMS SHAKING IS VERY DISTRACTING DURING NIGHT DRIVING AND THE SHAKING IS QUITE UNSAFE AS YOU CANNOT MAINTAIN A CONSISTENT, UNDISTURBED BEAM OF LIGHT IN FRONT OF THE VEHICLE AT TIMES WHEN SAME IS ABSOLUTELY MANDATORY.
